AdminChanged(address,address).details: Emitted when the admin account has changed.

BeaconUpgraded(address).details: Emitted when the beacon is changed.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

deleteCourseNFT(uint256).details: mint new Course NFTs , after it is intialised once

params.tokenId: tokenId of the NFT for which resource is to be deleted

disableModule().details: disable the mint module by reassigning it to address(0)

editCourseNFT(uint256,string).details: mint new Course NFTs , after it is intialised once

params.newNFTURI: new & updated NFT URI containing info about the particular resource
params.tokenId: tokenId of the NFT for which resource is to be updated

initialize(uint256,uint256,string,string.details: Intialise the course by creating Resource and Certificates Contract

params._courseId: Id of the Course being created on Owlearn
params._creatorId: Id fo the Course Creator on Owlearn
params.certificateBaseURI: NFT URI , dynamic , off-chain server link , fetching progree & certificates for a Course Learner
params.courseCreator: creator of the Course , who will also control the Collection
params.courseNFTURIs: courseNFTURIs to be minted , containing info about the particular resource
params.courseName: Name of the Course , will also be the name of NFT Collection
params.courseSymbol: Symbol of the Course , will be the symbol of NFT Collection
params.courseURI: courseURI , containing any extra course Info , not to be stored on-chain
params.implmRegisteryAddress: implm Registery for the Owlearn Protocol , only set by courseFactory
params.moduleRegisteryAddress: Module Registery for the Owlearn Protocol , only set by courseFactory

mintCourseCertificate(address,bytes).details: Mint a Course Certificate NFT TASK  : Add customization tasks

mintCourseNFTs(string[]).details: mint new Course NFTs , after it is intialised once

params.courseNFTURIs: courseNFTURIs to be minted , containing info about the particular resource

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAndInitialiseMintModule(address,bytes.details: Set a new mint Module & Initilaise it from the mint module contract

params._mintModule: mint Module address to be set
params.data: User data containing extra info to the mintModule Initialise functions

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

userdoc.notice: Course Master Contract , Single Point of Entry to create , and manage Course with Resource & Certificates Contract
